hanzi-su-wiki:
貢

Значения

Помогать деньгами, поддерживать, финансировать; дань, вклад

Мнемоника

Давать деньги 貝 под конкретную работу 工, финансировать.

Варианты

贡

gòng
to offer tribute; tribute; gifts
предложить дань; дань; дары

heisig_chinese_memo: This next song is a tribute to a little shellfish friend of mine who was tragically crushed by an I-shaped table.".
heisig_constituent: tribute, craft, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisig_story: A tribute has a kind of double-meaning in English: honor paid freely and money collected by coercion. Simply because a ruler bestows a noble name on a deed is hardly any consolation to the masses who must part with their hard-earned money. Little wonder that this ancient craft of getting money by calling it a tribute has given way to a name closer to how it feels to those who pay it: a tax.

искусство в голове, его документы - это шапка

тупой прокурор с балкой в голове
koohiiStory1: This next song is a TRIBUTE to a little SHELLFISH friend of mine who was tragically crushed by an I-shaped table..
koohiiStory2: Tribute is the craft of raising money.
jp_example_words: 貢献(こうけん): contribution, services
jp_readingExamples: 貢献 (こうけん), 貢 (みつぐ)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: This construction project made from shellfish will act as a tribute to the Crabigator.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: The Crabigator is a sea creature (maybe?), so making a tribute from shellfish makes some sense.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This great tribute is being commissioned by Emperor こういち.
WaniKani_Reading_Info:
In his power, こういち has made a new religion around the Crabigator, to put the fear of kanji learning into his subjects.
Hint: When you see 工 in a kanji it will often take the こう reading.
Ru_Radicals: ハ, 工 (техника), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
Ru_trainchinese: gòng: (графема) дань, подношение; платить дань, делать вклад в, способствовать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the shellfish (貝) is working (工) to support his family
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: After doing work, people pay tribute to the government by giving it clams (money).
humanum_full_description_en:
" Gong " is an upstart character (Chen Jian) created for the "contribution" of "[章丮]", see " Gan ". " Gong " from " Bei ", " Work " sound. The original meaning is the contribution of the lower to the upper. "Said Wen": "Gong, contribution. Cong Bei, Gong Sheng." "Guang Ya. "Explanation": "tribute, offer also." Such as "Shang Shu. "Yugong": "Ren the soil to make a tribute", Kong Yingda Shu: "The tribute is the title of offering from below, which is called "Jue Gong" by offering all the foreign objects born from the valley and the land. ""Zuo Zhuan. "Fifteen Years of Huan Gong": "The princes don't tribute the car uniforms, and the emperor does not seek wealth privately.

" Gong " and " Gan " originally meant the same word, and " tribute " could also mean reward. "Er Ya. Interpretation: "tribute, give also." For example, "Historical Records. The Biography of Zhongni’s Disciples: "Duanmu Ci, Weiren, Zi Gong." In the unearthed documents, " tribute " is used as " Gan ", such as "Shangbo Zhushu II. "Lupang Drought" Jane 3 "Out of Yu Zigan", "Shanghai Bo Zhushu Five. "A gentleman is a ritual" Jane 11 "Zi Gan Yue" and so on.

" Gong " is extended to mean offerings, namely offerings. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "The Thirteenth Year of Zhaogong": "The former emperor's tribute, the weight is listed. The tribute of the princes is heavy, and the system of the week is also. The humble and heavy tribute is also served." "Xunzi. "The King System": "The distance of reason is tribute, and the corn can flow through the property, and if there is no stay, the phase will shift."

" Gong " is said to be the name of the tax law in the Xia Dynasty. "Shang Shu" has an "Yugong" chapter, Cai Chen's collection: "Gong, the general name of Xiahou's Tian Fu." "Mencius. "Teng Wen Gong 1": "Xiahou's family pays fifty tributes, Yin people seventy tributes, Zhou people fulfil one hundred acres, in fact, they are tithes." Zhao Qi's note: "The people cultivate fifty acres and tribute five acres. ."

" Gong " also expressed recommendation. "Gong Ju" was an ancient system for recommending talents to the court. "Gongshi" is the recommended taxi, and was called "Xiaolian" in the Han Dynasty. "Book of Rites. "She Yi": "It is the system of the emperor of the ancients: the princes offer tribute to the emperor, and the emperor tries to shoot the palace." Kong Yingdashu: "A tribute to the emperor in three years." "Zuo Zhou Huang Biography": "The filial piety of the county, the ancient tribute, the people who came out, the propaganda of the Association."
humanum_short_description_en: " Gong " is an up-and-coming character (Chen Jian) created for the "contribution" of "[章丮]", starting with "贝" and "工". The original meaning is the contribution of the lower to the upper.
humanum_full_description:
「貢」是為「[章丮]」的「貢獻」義造的後起分化字（陳劍），參見「贛」。「貢」從「貝」，「工」聲。本義是下對上的貢獻。《說文》：「貢，獻功也。从貝，工聲。」《廣雅．釋言》：「貢，獻也。」如《尚書．禹貢》：「任土作貢」，孔穎達疏：「貢者，從下獻上之稱，謂以所出之穀，市其土地所生異物，獻其所有，謂之『厥貢』。」《左傳．桓公十五年》：「諸侯不貢車服，天子不私求財。」

　　「貢」和「贛」最初表示的是同一個詞，「貢」亦可表示賞賜。《爾雅．釋詁》：「貢，賜也。」例如《史記．仲尼弟子列傳》：「端沐賜，衛人，字子貢。」出土文獻中「貢」作「贛」，如《上博竹書二．魯邦大旱》簡3「出遇子贛」、《上博竹書五．君子為禮》簡11「子贛曰」等。

　　「貢」引申表示上獻之物，即供品。如《左傳．昭公十三年》：「昔天子班貢，輕重以列。列尊貢重，周之制也。卑而貢重者，甸服也。」《荀子．王制》：「理道之遠近而致貢，通流財物粟米，無有滯留，使相歸移也。」

　　「貢」相傳為夏代的稅法之名。《尚書》有「禹貢」一篇， 蔡沈集傳：「貢，夏后氏田賦之總名。」《孟子．滕文公上》：「夏后氏五十而貢，殷人七十而助，周人百畝而徹，其實皆什一也。」趙岐注：「民耕五十畝，貢上五畝。」

　　「貢」還表示舉薦。「貢舉」是古代地方向朝廷舉薦人才的制度。「貢士」即被舉薦的士，漢代稱為「孝廉」。《禮記．射義》：「是故古者天子之制：諸侯歲獻貢士於天子，天子試之於射宮。」孔穎達疏：「諸侯三年一貢士於天子也。」《後漢書．左周黃列傳》：「郡國孝廉，古之貢士，出則宰民，宣協風教。」
humanum_short_description: 「貢」是為「[章丮]」的「貢獻」義造的後起分化字（陳劍），從「貝」，「工」聲。本義是下對上的貢獻。

①獻東西給上級，古代臣下或屬國把物品進獻給帝王：進貢。納貢。貢獻。貢品。貢賦。
②封建時代給朝廷薦舉人才：貢生(指經科舉考試升入京師國子監讀書的人)。貢舉。
③姓氏。

貢献(こうけん): contribution, services

「 貢 」是為「[章丮]」的「貢獻」義造的後起分化字（陳劍），參見「 贛 」。「 貢 」從「 貝 」，「 工 」聲。本義是下對上的貢獻。《說文》：「貢，獻功也。从貝，工聲。」《廣雅．釋言》：「貢，獻也。」如《尚書．禹貢》：「任土作貢」，孔穎達疏：「貢者，從下獻上之稱，謂以所出之穀，市其土地所生異物，獻其所有，謂之『厥貢』。」《左傳．桓公十五年》：「諸侯不貢車服，天子不私求財。」 「 貢 」和「 贛 」最初表示的是同一個詞，「 貢 」亦可表示賞賜。《爾雅．釋詁》：「貢，賜也。」例如《史記．仲尼弟子列傳》：「端沐賜，衛人，字子貢。」出土文獻中「 貢 」作「 贛 」，如《上博竹書二．魯邦大旱》簡3「出遇子贛」、《上博竹書五．君子為禮》簡11「子贛曰」等。 「 貢 」引申表示上獻之物，即供品。如《左傳．昭公十三年》：「昔天子班貢，輕重以列。列尊貢重，周之制也。卑而貢重者，甸服也。」《荀子．王制》：「理道之遠近而致貢，通流財物粟米，無有滯留，使相歸移也。」 「 貢 」相傳為夏代的稅法之名。《尚書》有「禹貢」一篇， 蔡沈集傳：「貢，夏后氏田賦之總名。」《孟子．滕文公上》：「夏后氏五十而貢，殷人七十而助，周人百畝而徹，其實皆什一也。」趙岐注：「民耕五十畝，貢上五畝。」 「 貢 」還表示舉薦。「貢舉」是古代地方向朝廷舉薦人才的制度。「貢士」即被舉薦的士，漢代稱為「孝廉」。《禮記．射義》：「是故古者天子之制：諸侯歲獻貢士於天子，天子試之於射宮。」孔穎達疏：「諸侯三年一貢士於天子也。」《後漢書．左周黃列傳》：「郡國孝廉，古之貢士，出則宰民，宣協風教。」

Seal characters (1)

貢字的基本解释

貢
gòng
见“贡”。

貢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gòng］
［《廣韻》古送切，去送，見。］
“贡1”的繁体字。
(1)进贡；进献方物于帝王。
(2)泛指呈献。
(3)贡税；贡品。
(4)相传为夏代田赋名。
(5)荐举。
(6)谓成为贡生。
(7)指贡生。
(8)进。
(9)示告；告诉。
(10)赏赐。
(11)骄傲自大。参见“貢高”。
(12)溃乱。
(13)姓。汉有贡禹。

貢字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　貢； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1205第01
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?古送切，攻去聲。【說文】獻功也。【書·禹貢序】禹別九州，隨山濬川，任土作貢。【傳】任其土地所有，定其貢賦之差。【周禮·天官·大宰】以九貢致邦國之用。【禮·曲禮】五官致貢曰享。【註】貢，功也。　又【易·繫辭】六爻之義，易以貢。【註】告也。　又【爾雅·釋詁】貢，賜也。　又【廣雅】貢，上也。　又【玉篇】貢，通也。　又【廣韻】貢，薦也。　又姓。【前漢·貢禹傳】字少翁，琅邪人。【急就篇】孔子弟子子貢，其後以字爲氏。

貢字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
貢字的起名意思

暂无。

tribute

tribute
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gòng］
["Guangyun" ancient delivery cut, go to deliver, see you. ]
Traditional characters for "贡1".
(1) To pay tribute; to offer gifts to the emperor.
(2) Refers generally to presentations.
(3) Tribute; tribute.
(4) According to legend, the name was given to Tian in the Xia Dynasty.
(5) Recommendations.
(6) Said to become a tribute.
(7) Refers to Gongsheng.
(8) Advance.
(9) Notice; tell.
(10) Rewards.
(11) Pride and arrogance. See "Gong Gao".
(12) Disruption.
(13) Last name. There is Gong Yu in the Han Dynasty.
tribute
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary collection] [Beijing Department] 　贡; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: page 1205 01
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Ancient sent and cut, attacking sound. [Said the text] Contributions too. 【Book·Yu Gong Preface】Yu departs from Kyushu, and dredges the river along with the mountains, and takes the earth as a tribute. [Biography] Let the land be owned, and the difference of the tribute will be determined. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Da Zai】To use nine tributes to the state. 【Rite·Song Ceremony】The five sense organs pay tribute and enjoy. [Note] Tribute means merit.　[Yi·Xi Ci] The meaning of six lines, easy to pay tribute. [Note] Report also.　[Erya·Shixu] tribute, give it too.　[Guang Ya] Gong, Shang Ye.　[Jade articles] Tribute, Tongye.　[Guangyun] tribute, recommend it.　Another last name. [Previous Han·Gong Yu Biography] The character Shao Weng, Langxie. [Jijiu articles] Confucius' disciple Zi Gong, after which the word is the name of clan.

Meaning Mnemonic
This construction project made from shellfish will act as a tribute to the Crabigator.
The Crabigator is a sea creature (maybe?), so making a tribute from shellfish makes some sense.
Reading Mnemonic
This great tribute is being commissioned by Emperor こういち.
In his power, こういち has made a new religion around the Crabigator, to put the fear of kanji learning into his subjects.
Hint: When you see 工 in a kanji it will often take the こう reading.

Examples: 貢献 (こうけん), 貢 (みつぐ)
ハ, 工 (техника), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
